title: Ore no Ongaeshi: High Spec Murazukuri (WN) - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Calm Protagonist   Childcare   Clever Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Domestic Affairs   Dwarfs   Economics   Farming   Hard-Working Protagonist   Industrialization   Leadership   Loli   Male Protagonist   Management   Medieval   Modern Knowledge   Monsters   Nobles   Power Struggle   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   Schemes And Conspiracies   Transported to Another World
author: Haaana Denka   ハーーナ殿下
description:
I was a mountain climber in Japan, and when I noticed, the view that spread before me was a strange one.

A villainous Lord and a rural village at the brink of destruction filled with children. But those children have no way to oppose, so I guess I will save this village as thanks for them accepting me.>
